summary:
Are you tired and bored listening to the old "Dragonborn" music in the main menu?
Well, i'm here to save your day! This mod replaces the old music with new ones! Even better, and more dramatic!
descriptionHtml:
-Are you tired and bored listening to the old "Dragonborn" music in the main menu?
Well, i'm here to save your day! This mod replaces the old music with new ones! Even better, and more dramatic!-\
========================================================================================================
DRAMATIC MAIN THEME -
This mod is completely harmless, and won't cause any trouble in your gameplay. This mod just replaces the Main Theme with new ones.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Manual (advanced users)
1.) Extract the downloaded file.
2.) copy the
>Data 
>dramaticmainthemelog
3.) Paste it in your Skyrim directory.
4.) Enjoy! 
========================================================================================================
Future plans:
-By the way, i'll update this mod, whenever i receive reports or suggestions. Or whenever i think of new ideas.

(SPOILER)
NextGen
-Random Main Music Theme
-With new Backgrounds
*Yes, you read that right, "BACKGROUNDS" meaning random backgrounds.
=========================================================================================================
By PotatoTOTAPO (c) 2016
author: PotatoTOTAPO
